trans-unit.source: Define your Mobile Engagement strategy
trans-unit.target: Define your Mobile Engagement strategy

trans-unit.source: You wrote your app for a reason: to have your users use it!
trans-unit.target: You wrote your app for a reason: to have your users use it!

trans-unit.source: We believe you certainly put a great deal of effort in trying to make it a great app that users will love.
trans-unit.target: We believe you certainly put a great deal of effort in trying to make it a great app that users will love.

trans-unit.source: You also probably invested a sizeable amount of marketing budget to acquire users.
trans-unit.target: You also probably invested a sizeable amount of marketing budget to acquire users.

trans-unit.source: But after the initial exhilarating peak of users, you might see them slowly stop using your app.
trans-unit.target: But after the initial exhilarating peak of users, you might see them slowly stop using your app.

trans-unit.source: *This is what Azure Mobile Engagement all about!*: getting them to stick around and allow you to incrementally improve your app through test and learn.
trans-unit.target: *This is what Azure Mobile Engagement all about!*: getting them to stick around and allow you to incrementally improve your app through test and learn.

trans-unit.source: Our approach to improving retention and usage is based on engaging app users through push notifications and In-app messages, but in a very special way, with messages and communication tailored to them, each according to their behavior in your app.
trans-unit.target: Our approach to improving retention and usage is based on engaging app users through push notifications and In-app messages, but in a very special way, with messages and communication tailored to them, each according to their behavior in your app.

trans-unit.source: Our goal is to let you communicate with the right audience at the right time and the right location.
trans-unit.target: Our goal is to let you communicate with the right audience at the right time and the right location.

trans-unit.source: But for that, you'll have to start with *understanding your users*, then create groups based on what they did or their characteristics (we call it segments) and then create relevant communications to each segment.
trans-unit.target: But for that, you'll have to start with *understanding your users*, then create groups based on what they did or their characteristics (we call it segments) and then create relevant communications to each segment.

trans-unit.source: Mobile Engagement serves your objectives
trans-unit.target: Mobile Engagement serves your objectives

trans-unit.source: We talked about retention, and usage, but for what?
trans-unit.target: We talked about retention, and usage, but for what?

trans-unit.source: Building your Mobile Engagement strategy requires looking first at your app's objectives and key performance indicators (KPIs).
trans-unit.target: Building your Mobile Engagement strategy requires looking first at your app's objectives and key performance indicators (KPIs).

trans-unit.source: Start by defining the objectives and KPIs that help to define your engagement use-cases with the right prism.
trans-unit.target: Start by defining the objectives and KPIs that help to define your engagement use-cases with the right prism.

trans-unit.source: Your use-cases are a simple list of campaigns you'd like to make to communicate with your users, ranging from the simple welcome, to the very advanced utility notification triggered by your IT system.
trans-unit.target: Your use-cases are a simple list of campaigns you'd like to make to communicate with your users, ranging from the simple welcome, to the very advanced utility notification triggered by your IT system.

trans-unit.source: A well-constructed use-case must include at least the trio *what-who-when*:
trans-unit.target: A well-constructed use-case must include at least the trio *what-who-when*:

trans-unit.source: A very short designation (for example, a "Welcome campaign").
trans-unit.target: A very short designation (for example, a "Welcome campaign").

trans-unit.source: **What**: A message example (for example, "Glad to have you onboard!
trans-unit.target: **What**: A message example (for example, "Glad to have you onboard!

trans-unit.source: Remember to login to get your 1st month free!").
trans-unit.target: Remember to login to get your 1st month free!").

trans-unit.source: This message is by no means final, you'll be able to change it any time you like, but it usually helps to start thinking about what we want to say.
trans-unit.target: This message is by no means final, you'll be able to change it any time you like, but it usually helps to start thinking about what we want to say.

trans-unit.source: **Who**: The segment that will receive this message (for example, "All users who launched the app for the first time 3 days ago, have visited the login page but have not logged-in").
trans-unit.target: **Who**: The segment that will receive this message (for example, "All users who launched the app for the first time 3 days ago, have visited the login page but have not logged-in").

trans-unit.source: Yes, you can do that very easily with Azure Mobile Engagement :)
trans-unit.target: Yes, you can do that very easily with Azure Mobile Engagement :)

trans-unit.source: Again, this does not have to be final as you can define your segments at any time, but it is important to define early on your segmentation criteria to ensure you collect the right data.
trans-unit.target: Again, this does not have to be final as you can define your segments at any time, but it is important to define early on your segmentation criteria to ensure you collect the right data.

trans-unit.source: **When**: The timing of your campaign.
trans-unit.target: **When**: The timing of your campaign.

trans-unit.source: It may be on a given date, or after a specific action, based on a trigger.
trans-unit.target: It may be on a given date, or after a specific action, based on a trigger.

trans-unit.source: Mobile Engagement offers an important amount of possibilities to rightly time your communication.
trans-unit.target: Mobile Engagement offers an important amount of possibilities to rightly time your communication.

trans-unit.source: Once use-cases and segment are defined, it gives a guideline to define the data that must be collected within an application.
trans-unit.target: Once use-cases and segment are defined, it gives a guideline to define the data that must be collected within an application.

trans-unit.source: This is the role of a *“tag plan”*.
trans-unit.target: This is the role of a *“tag plan”*.

trans-unit.source: A tag plan allows you to ensure that the data collection is specified to the developers.
trans-unit.target: A tag plan allows you to ensure that the data collection is specified to the developers.

trans-unit.source: Hence, developers are able to embed Mobile Engagement with the right setup for you to work your campaigns with the right data.
trans-unit.target: Hence, developers are able to embed Mobile Engagement with the right setup for you to work your campaigns with the right data.

trans-unit.source: It will also be very important to run tests to ensure the integration is correct and collects what you need.
trans-unit.target: It will also be very important to run tests to ensure the integration is correct and collects what you need.

trans-unit.source: Based on the integration, once applications are published, you as a marketer will be able to see your analytics in real-time, segment your audience and then start to send smart targeted push notification to engage with end-users in or out of the app.
trans-unit.target: Based on the integration, once applications are published, you as a marketer will be able to see your analytics in real-time, segment your audience and then start to send smart targeted push notification to engage with end-users in or out of the app.

trans-unit.source: Use-cases to get started
trans-unit.target: Use-cases to get started

trans-unit.source: Welcome strategy: Create several push notification campaigns based on the end-user behavior at the launch of the application in order to re-engage at D+2/5/10/15 after the first session and increase first run retention.
trans-unit.target: Welcome strategy: Create several push notification campaigns based on the end-user behavior at the launch of the application in order to re-engage at D+2/5/10/15 after the first session and increase first run retention.

trans-unit.source: Promote a new content (feature, article/video, or product) based on the behavior of the end-user to send the information only to end-users that are more likely to engage.
trans-unit.target: Promote a new content (feature, article/video, or product) based on the behavior of the end-user to send the information only to end-users that are more likely to engage.

trans-unit.source: Rate the application: Target less than 1 percent of your user base that is most likely to rate the app 5 stars on the store.
trans-unit.target: Rate the application: Target less than 1 percent of your user base that is most likely to rate the app 5 stars on the store.

trans-unit.source: Boost subscriptions: Promote valuable contents to end-users that have not seen them yet to increase subscription.
trans-unit.target: Boost subscriptions: Promote valuable contents to end-users that have not seen them yet to increase subscription.

trans-unit.source: Tutorial: No more mandatory tutorial for everyone.
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: No more mandatory tutorial for everyone.

trans-unit.source: Why not build great tutorials in-app and then trigger them through in-app messages only if the user seems to not use the app or has difficulty using a feature?

trans-unit.source: Why do you need analytics to engage?
trans-unit.target: Why do you need analytics to engage?

trans-unit.source: As you might realize at this point, making a broadcast push notification only is not enough.
trans-unit.target: As you might realize at this point, making a broadcast push notification only is not enough.

trans-unit.source: The core concept of Mobile Engagement is to help marketers and developers engage with the right end-user at the right time and in the right place.
trans-unit.target: The core concept of Mobile Engagement is to help marketers and developers engage with the right end-user at the right time and in the right place.

trans-unit.source: To know those three main concepts, it is essential to gather analytics from your application and then use it to segment your audience.
trans-unit.target: To know those three main concepts, it is essential to gather analytics from your application and then use it to segment your audience.

trans-unit.source: This is also even more powerful when behavior segments complements data from your other database or CRM or from a cross channel.
trans-unit.target: This is also even more powerful when behavior segments complements data from your other database or CRM or from a cross channel.

trans-unit.source: Mobile Engagement allows retrieving data from anywhere and uses it to target the right audience.
trans-unit.target: Mobile Engagement allows retrieving data from anywhere and uses it to target the right audience.

trans-unit.source: To be the most contextual possible when engaging your audience, it is crucial to have the knowledge of the end-users behavior, to know their status in real-time.
trans-unit.target: To be the most contextual possible when engaging your audience, it is crucial to have the knowledge of the end-users behavior, to know their status in real-time.

trans-unit.source: Data collection allows marketers to focus really on what matters to play use-cases and achieve their mobile engagement strategy objectives.
trans-unit.target: Data collection allows marketers to focus really on what matters to play use-cases and achieve their mobile engagement strategy objectives.

trans-unit.source: Achieving the objectives set earlier is also the reason why the best practice in fact is not to gather anything and everything in the analytics but only those that allow you to focus on what you want to learn and your use-cases.
trans-unit.target: Achieving the objectives set earlier is also the reason why the best practice in fact is not to gather anything and everything in the analytics but only those that allow you to focus on what you want to learn and your use-cases.
